items.title: The Court Of Appeals For The Federal Circuit's In Re Riggs Decision: 35 USC 102(e) Prior Art Requires Written Description Support In Provisional Application For Disclosure Relied On To Reject Claims
items.description: On March 24, 2025, the US Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit issued a decision titled In Re: Riggs that vacated a decision of the Patent Trial and Appeal Board of the US Patent and Trademark...
